protocol.name: P-GSE38721-1
protocol.text: Raw data (CEL files) obtained from RNA hybridisation experiments were normalized with the affyPLM package from the Bioconductor software project (Gentleman et al., 2004) using the GCRMA that uses GC content of probes in normalization with RMA (Robust Multiple array Average) and  gives one value for each probe set instead of keeping probe level information (Wu et al., 2004). The transcriptional changes were determined by subtracting the normalized signal intensity of the control samples from that of induced samples. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA normalized

protocol.name: P-GSE38721-2
protocol.text: After two weeks, seedlings were transferred to MS liquid medium while shaking. β-estradiol (Sigma-Aldrich) was added to the medium to a final concentration of 10 μM. Subsequently, seedlings were harvested at 5h after estradiol addition.

protocol.name: P-GSE38721-3
protocol.text: for IOE: Seeds were surface-sterilized for 1 min in 70% ethanol and then in sterilisation solution (20% sodium hypochlorite) for 30 min. After sterilization, the seeds were sown on half-strength MS medium (Murashige and Skoog, 1962), supplemented with 1% (w/v) sucrose and solidified with 0.7% (w/v) phytoagar and appropriate antibiotics. After imbibition, the seeds were stratified at 4°C for 3 days. The seeds were germinated at 22°C under a 16-h day (140 µmol m-2 s-1) / 8-h night regime. The two-week-old Arabidopsis seedlings were carefully removed from plates subjected to Est/Mocktreatments. for_plants_used_for_protoplast_preparation: Col-0 seeds were directly sown on soil and plants were grown under long day (16 h light / 8 h dark) conditions.

protocol.name: P-GSE38721-5
protocol.text: Labelling, hybridisation, washing, staining, and scanning procedures were performed by an Affymetrix authorized service provider (ATLAS Biolabs, Berlin, Germany) as described in the Affymetrix technical manual
